titleStmt.title: The prologue to Mr. Lacy's new play, Sir Hercules Buffoon or the poetical esquire. Written by Tho. Durfey, Gent. Spoken by Mr. Haynes.
titleStmt.author: D'Urfey, Thomas, 1653-1723.
Lacy, John, d. 1681.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Joseph Hindmarsh, bookseller to His Royal Highness, living at the Black Bull in Cornhill,

notesStmt.note: Verse - "Ye scribling fops, (cry mercy if I wrong ye)".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
